thread.title: Excellent hotel, good location
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel, good location - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 588dea
title: Excellent hotel, good location
text: First time staying at this hotel. The staff were very welcoming and pleasant, nothing was too much trouble. The room was a decent size and very clean. The location is very good with good transport links - bus stop around the corner, tube station 10 min walk, Trafalgar Square 20 min walk.
